<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Remove React App">1301258f0781541037c7f2ae7c1ed0c4</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Delete Selected UX Page</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    var uxPageRecordId = g_form.getValue('ux_page');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('ReactSPAUtil');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajax_removeUxPage');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_page_record_id', uxPageRecordId);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(successMessage) {
		g_form.setValue('ux_page', '');
        g_form.clearMessages();
        g_form.addInfoMessage(successMessage);
    });

    return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-01 15:05:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cc52218307c1541037c7f2ae7c1ed0d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete Selected UX Page</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cc52218307c1541037c7f2ae7c1ed0d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-04 12:10:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Create React App">2cbf637a078d141037c7f2ae7c1ed03d</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Initialize Application</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    var applicationName = g_form.getValue('title');
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('ReactSPAUtil');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajax_initializeUxPage');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_application_name', applicationName);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
		g_form.setValue('title', '');
		g_form.clearMessages();
		if(response == null) g_form.addErrorMessage("Application with name '" + applicationName + "' exists");
		else {
			response = JSON.parse(response);
			g_form.addInfoMessage("'"+applicationName+"' application created");
			top.window.open(response.reactAppLink, '_blank');
		}
    });
	
    return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-02 13:43:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>41085e9307cd541037c7f2ae7c1ed0c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Initialize Application</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_41085e9307cd541037c7f2ae7c1ed0c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-06 05:19:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ade4208a0749901037c7f2ae7c1ed0b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ReactSPAUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReactSPAUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var ReactSPAUtil = Class.create();
ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES = {
    'page': 'sys_ux_page',
    'registry': 'sys_ux_page_registry',
    'component': 'sys_ux_lib_component',
    'element': 'sys_ux_page_element',
    'script': 'sys_ux_lib_source_script'
};
ReactSPAUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    // for record producer, initializes ux page & return the sys_id of the script record
    ajax_initializeUxPage: function() {

        var applicationName = this.getParameter('sysparm_application_name');

        if (this._isApplicationNameValid(applicationName) === false) return null;
		
        var appNameWithoutSpaces = applicationName.toString().toLowerCase().split(' ').join('-');
        var appUrlPath = applicationName.toString().toLowerCase().split(' ').join('_');
		
		var appUrlBase = this._getAppUrlPath(appUrlPath);

        var uxPageGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.page);
        uxPageGr.initialize();
        uxPageGr.title = applicationName;
        var uxPageRecordId = uxPageGr.insert();

        // generates react app base url
        var registryRecordId = this._createRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.registry, {
            title: applicationName,
            page: uxPageRecordId,
            path: appUrlPath
        });

        // actual source code container of the react app
        var scriptRecordId = this._createRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.script, {
            name: appNameWithoutSpaces
        });
		
		//inserting boilerplate react code
		var scriptGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.script);
		scriptGr.get(scriptRecordId);
		scriptGr.script = unescape(ReactSPAUtil.REACT_STARTER_BOILERPLATE_STR.replace('script_record_id_placeholder', scriptRecordId).replace('app_url_base_placeholder', appUrlBase));
		scriptGr.update();

        // create base html tag or root component of react app
        var componentRecordId = this._createRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.component, {
            tag: 'root',
            source_script: scriptRecordId
        });

        // link the root component to the ux page
        var elementRecordId = this._createRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.element, {
            name: appNameWithoutSpaces,
            page: uxPageRecordId,
            component: componentRecordId
        });

        // link the page element with the ux page
        uxPageGr.root_element = elementRecordId;
        uxPageGr.update();
		
		this._createModuleForApp(applicationName, appUrlBase);

        return JSON.stringify({
            reactAppLink: appUrlBase
        });
    },
    ajax_removeUxPage: function(pageGr) {
        var pageRecordId = this.getParameter('sysparm_page_record_id') || pageGr.sys_id;
        if (!pageGr) {
            pageGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.page);
            pageGr.get(pageRecordId);
        }
        var successMessage = "'" + pageGr.getValue('title') + "' successfully removed";

        var elementRecordId = pageGr.root_element;
        var componentRecordId = pageGr.root_element.component;
        var scriptRecordId = pageGr.root_element.component.source_script;
		var applicationName = pageGr.getValue('title');
        var registryGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.registry);
        registryGr.get('page', pageRecordId);
        var registryRecordId = registryGr.sys_id;
		var appFullURL = 'now/'+registryGr.getValue('path');

		this._removeModuleForApp(applicationName, appFullURL);
        this._deleteRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.page, pageRecordId);
        this._deleteRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.element, elementRecordId);
        this._deleteRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.component, componentRecordId);
        this._deleteRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.script, scriptRecordId);
        this._deleteRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.registry, registryRecordId);

        return successMessage;
    },
    getPageUrlFromScriptRecordId: function(uxScriptRecordId) {
        var host = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');

        var componentGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.component);
        componentGr.get('source_script', uxScriptRecordId);
        var elementGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.element);
        elementGr.get('component', componentGr.sys_id);
        var registryGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.registry);
        registryGr.get('page', elementGr.page);
		var appUrlPath = registryGr.getValue('path');

        return (appUrlPath === null ? null : host+this._getAppUrlPath(appUrlPath));
    },
	_getAppUrlPath: function(appUrlPath) {
		var vendorPrefix = null;
		var appGr = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
		appGr.addQuery('sys_id', gs.getCurrentApplicationId());
		appGr.query();
		if(appGr.next()) {
			var currentScopeName = appGr.getValue('scope');
			vendorPrefix = currentScopeName.split('_')[1];
		}
		return vendorPrefix === null ? 'now/'+appUrlPath : 'x/'+vendorPrefix +'/'+appUrlPath;
	},
    _createModuleForApp: function(applicationName, appFullURL) {
		var agg = new GlideAggregate(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.page);
		agg.addAggregate("COUNT");
		agg.query();
		var appCount = 0;
		if (agg.next()) {
			appCount = agg.getAggregate("COUNT");
		}
		
		var moduleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_app_module');
		moduleGr.initialize();
		moduleGr.title = applicationName + ' ';
		moduleGr.application = '319e86bd07c1901037c7f2ae7c1ed079';
		moduleGr.order = appCount*100 + 200;
		moduleGr.link_type = 'DIRECT';
		moduleGr.query = appFullURL;
		moduleGr.window_name = moduleGr.title;
		moduleGr.insert();
	},
	_removeModuleForApp: function(applicationName, appFullURL) {
		var moduleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_app_module');
		moduleGr.addQuery('application', '319e86bd07c1901037c7f2ae7c1ed079');
		moduleGr.addQuery('title', applicationName + ' ').addOrCondition('query', appFullURL);
		moduleGr.query();
		if(moduleGr.next()) {
			moduleGr.deleteRecord();
		}
	},
	_isApplicationNameValid: function(applicationName) {
        var valid = true;
        var uxPageGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.page);
        uxPageGr.addQuery('title', applicationName);
        uxPageGr.query();
        if (uxPageGr.next()) {
            valid = false;
        }
        return valid;
    },
    // helper method to create records using field data
    _createRecord: function(table, fieldData) {
        var fields = Object.keys(fieldData);
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        gr.initialize();
        fields.forEach(function(field) {
            gr[field] = fieldData[field];
        });
        return gr.insert();
    },
    // helper method to delete a record
    _deleteRecord: function(table, sys_id) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        gr.get(sys_id);
        gr.deleteRecord();
    },
    type: 'ReactSPAUtil'
});

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>React Script Injector</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var requestBody = JSON.parse(request.body.dataString);
    var uxScriptRecordId = request.pathParams.sys_id || '';
	var script = requestBody.script || '';

    var uxScriptGr = new GlideRecord(ReactSPAUtil.UX_TABLE_NAMES.script);
    uxScriptGr.addQuery('sys_id', uxScriptRecordId);
    uxScriptGr.query();
    if (uxScriptGr.next()) {
        uxScriptGr.script = unescape(script);
        uxScriptGr.update();
		response.setBody({pageUrl: new ReactSPAUtil().getPageUrlFromScriptRecordId(uxScriptRecordId)});
        response.setStatus(200);
    } else {
		throw "Path param invalid : 'sys_id'";
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/488924/react_spa_provider/inject_react/{sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/inject_react/{sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-28 21:07:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5bec6bd07c1901037c7f2ae7c1ed072</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>React Script Injector</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f5bec6bd07c1901037c7f2ae7c1ed072</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 15:08:45</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ReactSPAProvider">739d8a7d07c1901037c7f2ae7c1ed0fe</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
